title: `install .` within a subdataset with + in its name errors out
body:
#### What is the problem?

I thought it was a side effect of fixes in #1921 but then reproduced with current master 0.10.0.rc1-9-g9017b45b

#### What steps will reproduce the problem?

```shell
hopa:/tmp
$> datalad install ///dicoms/dartmouth-phantoms/
[INFO   ] Cloning http://datasets.datalad.org/dicoms/dartmouth-phantoms/ to '/tmp/dartmouth-phantoms' 
install(ok): /tmp/dartmouth-phantoms (dataset)
(dev3) 1 17204.....................................:Mon 30 Apr 2018 10:59:34 AM EDT:.
hopa:/tmp
$> cd dartmouth-phantoms/bids_test6-PD+T2w      
(dev3) 1 17205.....................................:Mon 30 Apr 2018 10:59:47 AM EDT:.
(git-annex)hopa:/tmp/dartmouth-phantoms[master]bids_test6-PD+T2w
$> datalad install .                            
[INFO   ] Cloning http://datasets.datalad.org/dicoms/dartmouth-phantoms/bids_test6-PD%252BT2w/.git to '/tmp/dartmouth-phantoms/bids_test6-PD+T2w' 
[WARNING] Something went wrong while installing bids_test6-PD+T2w: [Errno 2] No such file or directory [base.py:clone_from:979] 
[ERROR  ] Installation of subdatasets /tmp/dartmouth-phantoms/bids_test6-PD+T2w failed with exception: InstallFailedError: 
Failed to install dataset from any of: ['http://datasets.datalad.org/dicoms/dartmouth-phantoms/bids_test6-PD%252BT2w/.git', 'http://datasets.datalad.org/dicoms/dartmouth-phantoms/bids_test6-PD%2BT2w/.git'] [get.py:_install_subds_from_flexible_source:183] [install(/tmp/dartmouth-phantoms/bids_test6-PD+T2w)] 
install(error): /tmp/dartmouth-phantoms/bids_test6-PD+T2w (dataset) [Installation of subdatasets /tmp/dartmouth-phantoms/bids_test6-PD+T2w failed with exception: InstallFailedError: 
Failed to install dataset from any of: ['http://datasets.datalad.org/dicoms/dartmouth-phantoms/bids_test6-PD%252BT2w/.git', 'http://datasets.datalad.org/dicoms/dartmouth-phantoms/bids_test6-PD%2BT2w/.git'] [get.py:_install_subds_from_flexible_source:183]]

```

it does work if installation is done from outside of that directory:

```shell
hopa:/tmp
$> datalad install ///dicoms/dartmouth-phantoms/
[INFO   ] Cloning http://datasets.datalad.org/dicoms/dartmouth-phantoms/ to '/tmp/dartmouth-phantoms' 
install(ok): /tmp/dartmouth-phantoms (dataset)
(dev3) 1 17209.....................................:Mon 30 Apr 2018 11:00:22 AM EDT:.
hopa:/tmp
$> cd dartmouth-phantoms 
PHANTOM-20160909/  Philips-20131217/  bids_test3-20161011/  bids_test5-20170120/  datapackage.json
PHANTOM1_3/        bids_test3/        bids_test4-20161014/  bids_test6-PD+T2w/
(dev3) 1 17210.....................................:Mon 30 Apr 2018 11:00:24 AM EDT:.
(git-annex)hopa:/tmp/dartmouth-phantoms[master]
$> datalad install bids_test6-PD+T2w          
[INFO   ] Cloning http://datasets.datalad.org/dicoms/dartmouth-phantoms/bids_test6-PD%252BT2w/.git to '/tmp/dartmouth-phantoms/bids_test6-PD+T2w' 
install(ok): /tmp/dartmouth-phantoms/bids_test6-PD+T2w (dataset) [Installed subdataset in order to get /tmp/dartmouth-phantoms/bids_test6-PD+T2w]
```
